education.description: Gaining proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Learning to develop complex web applications using React and Node.js. Building a strong foundation in back-end development with Python and Django. Enhancing skills in database management with SQL. Focusing on full-stack development techniques and modern web technologies. Actively working on various hands-on projects that apply real-world applications of the learned skills. These projects will be showcased on my GitHub profile upon completion.

In-depth knowledge of SQL and PostgreSQL for database management. Proficient in Python programming for big data analysis, using tools like Jupyter Notebook and VSCode. Advanced data visualization skills with Seaborn, Plotly, and Dash. Expertise in creating interactive dashboards using Tableau. Hands-on experience with data manipulation using Pandas. Conducting and evaluating A/B tests for data-driven decision making. Successfully completed 13 real-world projects corresponding to each topic. These projects, showcasing my hands-on experience, are available on my GitHub profile. Enrolled in a 7-month course focusing on data analysis and visualization.

education.activities: Programme Representative, Student Ambassador, Student Councillor, Front-Runner Leadership and Discover Bloomberg Participant, Member of Cass Consultancy Society, President of Cass Russian Speaking Society and finally Cass Student Representative Officer.

education.degree: Business Management and Law, Business and Law

work_experience.description: Led the development of an online store that accounted for 30% of retail revenue by the end of 2020. Integrated SaaS Payment System provider and Warehouse Accounting provider into our CRM system. Implemented an improved system of warehouse automation based on barcoding of individual goods. Built an online system for onboarding of new/existing Customer Support Managers, which accelerated the process by 15% and increased CSI by 15-20% within 2 months of completing the onboarding process.

Developed multi-brand activation in №1 Retail in RU resulting in 19% net revenue growth +32 in-out SKUs on top of 96 listed. Pioneered big data partnership on 3.6MM card holders, resulting in 9.3% growth in related categories and 15.6% in P&G sales. Launched long-term data-driven loyalty-based subscription program which enabled +21.3% Shave care sales growth. Proficient in using Monday.com, JIRA.

Responsible for achieving growth, hitting sales targets, implementing a strategic plan that expands the customer base. Negotiated and carried out a contract with a chain of bars in London, which led to a partnership with a 37% revenue increase.
